text: He imanadaragana, allahara upara paripurna bisbasa sthapana kara ebam bisbasa sthapana kara tamra rasula'o tamra kitabera upara, ya tini nayila karechena sbiya rasulera upara ebam sesamasta kitabera upara, yegulo nayila kara hayechila itipurbe. Ye allahara upara, tamra pheresatadera upara, tamra kitaba samuhera upara ebam rasulaganera upara o kiyamatadinera upara bisbasa karabe na, se pathabhrasta haye bahu dure giye parabe.
